columns.name: name
columns.description: The resource name.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The resource identifier.

columns.name: state
columns.description: The state of the data lake analytics account.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The provisioning status of the data lake analytics account.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The resource type.

columns.name: account_id
columns.description: The unique identifier associated with this data lake analytics account.

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: The data lake analytics account creation time.

columns.name: current_tier
columns.description: The commitment tier in use for current month.

columns.name: default_data_lake_store_account
columns.description: The default data lake store account associated with this data lake analytics account.

columns.name: endpoint
columns.description: The full cname endpoint for this data lake analytics account.

columns.name: firewall_state
columns.description: The current state of the IP address firewall for this data lake analytics account.

columns.name: last_modified_time
columns.description: The data lake analytics account last modified time.

columns.name: max_degree_of_parallelism
columns.description: The maximum supported degree of parallelism for this data lake analytics account.

columns.name: max_degree_of_parallelism_per_job
columns.description: The maximum supported degree of parallelism per job for this data lake analytics account.

columns.name: max_job_count
columns.description: The maximum supported jobs running under the data lake analytics account at the same time.

columns.name: min_priority_per_job
columns.description: The minimum supported priority per job for this data lake analytics account.

columns.name: new_tier
columns.description: The commitment tier to use for next month.

columns.name: query_store_retention
columns.description: The number of days that job metadata is retained.

columns.name: system_max_degree_of_parallelism
columns.description: The system defined maximum supported degree of parallelism for this account, which restricts the maximum value of parallelism the user can set for the data lake analytics account.

columns.name: system_max_job_count
columns.description: The system defined maximum supported jobs running under the account at the same time, which restricts the maximum number of running jobs the user can set for the data lake analytics account.

columns.name: compute_policies
columns.description: The list of compute policies associated with this data lake analytics account.

columns.name: diagnostic_settings
columns.description: A list of active diagnostic settings for the data lake analytics account.

columns.name: data_lake_store_accounts
columns.description: The list of data lake store accounts associated with this data lake analytics account.

columns.name: firewall_allow_azure_ips
columns.description: The current state of allowing or disallowing IPs originating within azure through the firewall. If the firewall is disabled, this is not enforced.

columns.name: firewall_rules
columns.description: The list of firewall rules associated with this data lake analytics account.

columns.name: storage_accounts
columns.description: The list of azure blob storage accounts associated with this data lake analytics account.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
